message: This is a high-quality product. It's a rare opportunity to get a high-quality item at a fixed price of $100. If you're interested, I can offer you a satisfaction guarantee. If you're not satisfied with the product after purchasing, I'll give you a refund and we can part ways. This is a one-time offer, and I'm willing to take on the risk of offering a refund. What do you say?
